resources.string: Sync your notes with your Mi Account?
Delete this note? The excerpt will be deleted as well.
If you edit this note, some of its contents may be lost.
"Couldn't open this note. Restore it to edit its content."
Notes are working in the background
Release to create. Slide up to cancel.
"Audio file isn't fully downloaded or missing"
Copy text, save images and screenshots as excerpts
Allow this app to connect to the internet and grant the optional permissions to be able to use all its features.
Notes need permissions to connect to the internet, record audio, and access your contacts to work normally. Allow?
Notes need permissions to connect to the internet, record audio, and access your contacts to work normally. Allow?
Allow this app to connect to the internet and grant the mandatory permissions listed above.
Welcome to Notes! You can use this app to create tasks and notes that contain text, images, and audio.
"Switching to a different version of MIUI requires clearing the app data for Notes. Before you do that, make sure you've backed up your notes to the cloud."
An update is available. Update now?

"After you revoke authorization, the app will stop collecting data, and all the related data will be deleted from the servers. This might make the app virtually unusable. Revoke authorization anyway? To ensure your account's security, sign in to i.mi.com before revoking authorization for the cloud services."
"Hidden notes' password will be replaced with Privacy protection password which works for messages, photos, and hidden folders"
Privacy protection password works for messages, photos, and hidden folders
Use Privacy protection password. It works for messages, photos, and hidden folders.
Tap again to adjust stroke width and opacity
Press and hold the sketch for %d–%d seconds to adjust strokes automatically
Sync your notes with your Mi Account (%1$s)?
"Can't set reminder time for an empty note"
"Empty notes can't be placed on Home screen"
"Can't send an empty note to Weibo"
This note contains unsupported content, touch here to update
This note is already on your Home screen
Copied text and saved images will be saved to Notes
You can rename or delete folders here
Home screen shortcut allows you to swipe from the edge of the screen to view and create tasks. Create the shortcut now?
Gesture shortcut allows you to view and create tasks by swiping from the edge of the screen. You can turn this feature on and off in the Settings.
A folder with the same name already exists
Too fast! Wait a minute or two and try again.
You can tap, press and hold, and drag items to create and rearrange notes. Learn these gestures now?
Image description can contain up to %d characters
Tap to create a mind map
Sync with the cloud is off
Press and hold to create a voice note
Tap to create a text note. Press and hold to create a voice note. Release the button to stop recording and create the note, or slide up to cancel.

The Notes app is a great tool for recording your ideas. It has built-in reminders and syncs your items to the cloud so you can access them anywhere, anytime. Make sure you can do without these features before you delete the app.
"Looks like you're editing notes on your computer now. To avoid conflicting edits, close Notes on your computer."
Press and hold the plus to create a voice note
Press and hold a note and then drag it over another note to create a folder
Press and hold a note and then drag it over a folder to move the note there
"Mind maps aren't available in this version. Update the app to use this feature."
"Notes is a system app. You won't be able to use this app after you uninstall it."
You added a new task. Tap to view.
"Looks like you're editing notes on your phone now. To avoid conflicting edits, close Notes on your phone."
Drag an image here to create a note
Create a doodle on the phone
Creating a doodle on the phone…
Taking a photo with the phone…
Take a photo with the phone
This note was deleted. Restore to edit.
Enter text and press \"Enter\" to add an unfinished task
Malicious apps may use this to access your personal data.
For marking notes taken during calls
For marking notes taken during calls
To sync notes with the cloud, you need to connect to the internet. Mobile data might be used to sync items. Connect now?
For stopping recording voice notes during calls
Associating the notes created during calls with contacts
For adding images to notes and saving notes as images

string.name: permission_xiaoai_desc
string.Data: Mi AI will collect your voice recordings and device ID to transcribe audio and create voice notes. Learn more in Mi AI Privacy Policy.

resources.string: Swipe up with 2 fingers to delete notes without confirmation
Swipe from the edge of the screen to open task toolbox
Receive a reminder to create an excerpt whenever a URL is copied
Use the shortcut at the edge of the screen to create notes and tasks, as well as save copied URLs, text, and images to Notes.
Play reminder sound in Silent mode
Ignore Silent mode and keep playing sound until the alarm is turned off
Play sound even when Silent or DND mode is on
Show only quick notes on the start page
Pull down to open private folder
Quick notes allow you to create notes and excerpts
An error occurred, go to i.mi.com to restore notes.
Wait until the note is loaded and try again.
This note is too big to share.
"Can't connect to the network. Check your connection and try again."
Turn on sync with the cloud
Tap to sync notes with the cloud.
Fifth day of Chinese New Year
Fourth day of Chinese New Year
Second day of Chinese New Year
Seventh day of Chinese New Year
Sixth day of Chinese New Year
Third day of Chinese New Year
Opened the note with the excerpt
This note was hidden successfully. Pull down to see hidden notes.
This note was hidden successfully. Pull down to see hidden notes.
This note is hidden now. Pull down the side panel to view hidden notes.
"Can't add new attachments because note is too long"
"Can't add checkbox because note is too long"
This note is too long. Some text has been cut off of the end.
"Can't use this feature with Split screen"
"Can't use this feature in Split screen or floating windows"
"Contacts permissions are restricted. Allow Notes to read your contacts and find accounts on the device."
"Storage permissions are restricted. Allow Notes to read the contents of your SD card."
"Phone permissions are restricted. Allow Notes to read phone status and identity."
"Microphone permissions are restricted. Allow Notes to record audio."
Allow Notes to access storage to be able to add images to your notes
Allow Notes to display floating windows in other apps to be able to use this feature.
New items should contain at least one uncompleted task
Here you can add text and voice tasks.
To edit a text task, simply tap it.
"Don't forget to create a Home screen shortcut for Tasks."
Stay on top of your game and never miss anything important!
Tap \"Enter\" to create a checklist of subtasks
The notes you delete will be deleted permanently in %1$d days.
Notes are kept in the trash for %d days before being permanently deleted
You need to sign in again
Tap to create a note. Hold widget to resize.
